author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
93X version: #19948
-----------------------------
Running ` hltIntegrationTests /dev/CMSSW_9_2_0/GRun/V94 -i root://cms-xrd-global.cern.ch//store/data/Run2017B/MuonEG/RAW/v1/000/297/469/00000/C0653517-2D59-E711-91CD-02163E0118F3.root -x "--globaltag 92X_dataRun2_HLT_v4" -x "--l1-emulator uGT --l1 L1Menu_Collisions2017_v2_m6_full_xml" -j16 -n100 -d hltintegrationTestV94 &>logIntegrationDataV94 &`
we found inconsistencies between running full HLT menu and single HLT path.

This is due to some non-const members of TSGForOI that are not initialized at each event.

This PR is very important for the upcoming V2.1 menu.
title: Fix in TSGForOI muons - 92X
